channel.title: Early prototype feedback! PowerPoint on steroids (Cloud-based, better animation, analytics, send via email, delivery tracking, crm integration)
channel.description:
Have been having some fun with a friend of mine building a web based presentation tool in React as a side project. We're using a cocktail of APIs (Send Grid, GA, Typeform) along with a few AWS services to create a tool that lets users make a presentation, send it to someone and track the analytics from the viewer. Ignore the bugs as I know there are many.
Feel free to check it out and try to create something :) app.sizle.io
If you want to know when we (finally) launch a full version you can get do that at www.sizle.io
Would love to discuss any thoughts or questions anyone has about a software product like this!
